summary: Two screenplay writers find themselves in a strange place with no way out after a party they vaguely remember. They soon find they are surrounded by other strange characters and together try to figure out what happened the night before.
cast: Ekaterina Kuznetsova|Leonid Barats|Rostislav Khait|Kamil Larin|Aleksandr Demidov|Igor Zolotovitskiy|Artyom Smola|Nonna Grishaeva|Dmitriy Dibrov|Valdis Pelsh|Grigoriy Dantsiger|Sergey Frolov|Aleksandr Palchikov|Aleksey Sharanin|Stanislav Bogatyryov|Sergey Pomerantsev|Evgeniya Lyutaya|Sean Michael Thomas
title: Bystree, chem kroliki
